des: "Sweetened whipped cream filling.  Use to fill cakes, pastries, and pies. Also can use extracts to flavor whipping cream. Gelatin must be warm when added to whipping cream. Recipe can be doubled."
ins: Whip cream with confectioners' sugar until soft peaks form.  Dissolve gelatin in water over low heat.  Remove from heat, allow to cool slightly, then whip into cream until stiff peaks form.
